alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet; Leelanau; Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 4:14AM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT 7 AM THIS MORNING UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the WINTER STORM WARNING, snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY, snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Northern Lower Michigan. * WHEN...For the WINTER STORM WARNING, until 7 AM EST this morning. For the WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY, 7 AM EST this morning until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Antrim; Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet; Leelanau; Otsego
